metadata.name: 3lau.com
metadata.description:
This item certifies the ownership of the social layer associated with the domain, sub-domain or path. 

The certificate comes with a flag item to be used by the social layer client weblin.io. In short: install the weblin.io browser extension, acquire your flag, go to your domain, and plant the flag to show your ownership. 

About weblin.io: 

You have an avatar on every web page and you meet other people who are on the same page at the same time. It's anonymous. It's everywhere. It's real-time.

The avatar can move around. It lets you meet friends and strangers. You can talk in chat balloons, chat windows, and in a videoconference. The perfect tool for ad-hoc online meetings. No other tools required.

Need a quick videoconference: just use it. Want to make an online event: tell your guests to install weblin.io and meet on your web site. Need a better tool for meetups: see your participants on the meetup page, do the talk, and socialize. Want to have a community-feeling for your YouTube stream: offer weblin.io to your viewers and see them engage.
